code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[sender,setSender]=useState('');const[receiver,setReceiver]=useState('');const[amount,setAmount]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('https://your-backend-url.com/create_transaction',{sender,receiver,amount,timestamp:new Date().toISOString(),transaction_id:Math.random().toString(36).substr(2,9),verifiable_credential:'example_credential'});setMessage('Transaction successful!');}catch(error){setMessage('Transaction failed.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Love Currency Exchange"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Sender:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:sender,onChange:e=>setSender(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Receiver:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:receiver,onChange:e=>setReceiver(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Amount:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:amount,onChange:e=>setAmount(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Send Love Currency"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message})]});}export default App;
